title: Foundations and Practical Applications of 3D Human Motion Generation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Understanding 3D motion generation technologies used in the game/animation industry and cultivating practical application skills using AI-based tools.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core design principles of ADAM-Net (random masking, L-ADAM/S-ADAM attention)
Learners can generate natural 3D pose/shape transitions from temporally sparse photo inputs
Learners can design processes for applying generated motion data to industrial contexts (e.g., animation production)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
